result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin B Podeweltz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant was ordered to report immediately to the probation and parole office.
Concurrent with: Probation on case 14CM208

miscConds.notes: Fees, surcharges and costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.
Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request

Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcohol, and not go into places that sell alcohol except incidentally such as a grocery store, convenience store or gas station or other such place where alcohol is not sold for consumption on the premises.
The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.  The defendant shall submit to random urine testing/PBTs as required by the agent or any law enforcement .

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dustin B Podeweltz

records.addlTxt: Prosecutor Richard R. Lewis and Defendant, Dustin B Podeweltz appeared, pro se  Defendant finalized  waiver of  right to an attorney after full colloquy

Pre-trial conference on January 27, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
Status conference on February 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Prosecutor Richard R. Lewis and Defendant, Dustin B Podeweltz appeared, pro se  Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint.    Defendant advised of right to an attorney.    THE DEFENDANT ENTERED A PLEA OF NOT GUILTY  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 27, 2015 at 02:45 pm.  Status conference scheduled for February 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
